snippet: Alexandra Mayzler recently asked the group for advice on one of her latest ideas for her company, Thinking Caps Tutoring. Settling on a tag line that sounds good and differentiates the company has been difficult.
abstract: Alexandra Mayzler recently asked the group for advice on one of her latest ideas for her company, Thinking Caps Tutoring. Settling on a tag line that sounds good and differentiates the company has been difficult.

headline.main: A Tutoring Company in Search of a Tag Line
